```{r read in}

library(tidyverse)
library(Seurat)
library(patchwork)
library(here)

# Load the PBMC dataset
pbmc.data <- Read10X(data.dir = ("C:/Users/Chels/Documents/github/SeuratIntro/pbmc3k_filtered_gene_bc_matrices.tar.gz"))

# Initialize the Seurat object with the raw (non-normalized data).
pbmc <- CreateSeuratObject(counts = pbmc.data, project = "pbmc3k", min.cells = 3, min.features = 200)
pbmc
```
